definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: Therefore, it is difficult to set up the performance pattern of the decathlon athletes.
sentences.chinese: 制定十项全能运动员的成绩模式有一定的难度。

sentences.english: I'll do the scholastic decathlon and you'll win the championships.
sentences.chinese: 我会参加学术十项全能，你也会赢得冠军。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, he has won a lot of Golden , Silver and Bronze Awards in National Creative Festivals.
sentences.chinese: 同时获得全国各类广告创意大赛的金银铜奖数十项。

sentences.english: Products received dozens of honorary certificate by the Chinese and foreign customers of all ages.
sentences.chinese: 产品荣获数十项荣誉证书，深受中外客户的青睐。

sentences.english: The W. H. O. announced ten projects to test non-chemical methods for fighting mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 世界卫生组织宣布十项非化学方法消灭蚊子的实验。

sentences.english: Expressed their support for the Solar Decathlon organized by Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 对北京大学承办的太阳能十项全能竞赛表示支持。

sentences.english: Like the Olympic decathlon, this event is made up of ten events.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会十项全能一样，本次活动是由十大事件。

sentences.english: Among the ten perfections that should be fulfilled to become a Buddha, generosity takes the first place.
sentences.chinese: 要成佛要有十项功德，需要放在首位的是慷慨。

sentences.english: A decathlon champion could be seen as a strong man.
sentences.chinese: 一名十项全能冠军可视为世上的强人。

sentences.english: Can the general processing and high 10 items wait to get up together?
sentences.chinese: 一般处理和高十项能等同起来？

definition: three items/three events/three terms/tri-/trinomial, ternary (math.)/triathlon (abbr. for 三項全能|三项全能)
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

the four elements: earth, water, fire, and wind (Buddhism)/the four freedoms: speaking out freely, airing views fully, holding great debates, and writing big-character posters, 大鳴大放|大鸣大放[da4 ming2 da4 fang4], 大辯論|大辩论[da4 bian4 lun4], 大字報|大字报[da4 zi4 bao4] (PRC)
